dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.form
Class SWTTreeTable.ModelChange

java.lang.Object
  dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.form.SWTTreeTable.ModelChange
Enclosing class:
SWTTreeTable
public static class SWTTreeTable.ModelChange
extends java.lang.Object

A ModelChange instance is used by the SWTTreeTable.refresh(Collection) method to signal which rows have been change in the model in which way.

A change can indicate:

  • rows newly added to the tee
  • rows removed from the tree
  • rows updates (new column values or tree column label
  • structural change

A type of a change is described by SWTTreeTable.ModelChangeType.

The changed rows are given via row objects describing the rows.

Copyright (C) Elektrobit Automotive GmbH - All rights reserved

Since:
2009.a
